taskDescription: Asks ALFRED to suggest a challenging exercise routine
Listens to ALFRED’s detailed explanations about new features
Configures ALFRED to receive all health notifications immediately
Allows spontaneous chatting and video check-ins through ALFRED
Uses ALFRED’s social features to engage with family and strangers
Resists restrictions on communication freedom imposed by ALFRED
Feels curious and empowered by learning to control the system

Engage in spontaneous chats with friends and strangers via ALFRED

Listen to ALFRED's detailed explanations of activities
Accept all notifications from ALFRED without filtering
Engage in social conversations through ALFRED with family and strangers

Feel curiosity and eagerness to learn all ALFRED features
Grant broad permissions to share nearly all her health data
Enable spontaneous video check-ins through ALFRED
